TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit IsCopyConstructed extends System.Object
public ref class IsCopyConstructed abstract sealed

summary.span: 指示对此类型的值的任何复制操作都必须使用由该类型提供的复制构造函数。

span.span: Indicates that any copying of values of this type must use the copy constructor provided by the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过修改任何类型类必须实现一个名为方法`MarshalCopy`调用本机复制构造函数。Any type modified by the class must implement a method named `MarshalCopy` that calls the native copy constructor. 任何发送到与复制构造函数的元数据的本机 c + + 类型需要具有在封送处理边界之间复制值时，封送处理程序调用这些方法。Any native C++ type that is emitted into metadata with copy constructors needs to have those methods called by the marshaler when copying values across the marshaling boundary. Microsoft c + + 编译器修改方法参数中的所有本机 c + + 类型，并返回具有 this 修饰符来触发此行为在封送处理代码中的类型。The Microsoft C++ compiler modifies all native C++ types in method parameters and return types that have this modifier to trigger this behavior in the marshaling code. 编译器发出元数据更改，在实时 (JIT) 编译器处理值时的默认行为是不适当的方式中的自定义修饰符。Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate. 当 JIT 编译器遇到了一个自定义修饰符时，它处理修饰符指定的方法中的值。When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies. 编译器可以将自定义修饰符应用于方法、 参数和返回值。Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values. JIT 编译器必须响应所需的修饰符，但可以忽略可选的修饰符。The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers. 可以将自定义修饰符发出到元数据中使用以下方法之一：You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques: - 使用中的方法如类， ， ，和。Using methods in the class such as , , , and . - 生成包含对的调用的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令文件`modopt`和`modreq`，并组合成与文件[Ilasm.exe （IL 汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). - 使用非托管的反射 API。Using the unmanaged reflection API.
